original_text: They shall not marry a prostitute or a woman who has been defiled, neither shall they marry a woman divorced from her husband, for the priest is holy to his God.
korean_text: 그들은 부정한 창녀나 이혼 당한 여인을 취하지 말지니 이는 그가 여호와 하나님께 거룩함이니라

sentences.original_text: They shall not marry a prostitute
or a woman who has been defiled
neither shall they marry a woman divorced from her husband
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 남편에게서 이혼당한 여자와도 결혼하지 말아야 한다

sentences.original_text: for the priest is holy to his God
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 제사장이 자신의 하나님께 거룩하기 때문이다
